text:
Madeleine Juneau (10 November 1945 – 26 June 2020) was a Canadian museologist and teacher. She was a member of the Congregation of Notre Dame of Montreal. She was awarded the Prix Gérard-Morisset in 2013. She was born in Saint-Augustin-de-Desmaures, Quebec.
Juneau died in Verdun, France on 26 June 2020, aged 74.

annotations.surface_form: Congregation of Notre Dame of Montreal
